item.title: [Rental] Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils
  • Volume knob and tone knob
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042
  • Colour: Tidepool

item.title: Gretsch G5420T Electromatic Hollow Body Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Classic hollow-body electric guitar with vintage-inspired tone and style.
item.content:encoded:
The Gretsch G5420T Electromatic hollow-body electric guitar captures the essence of Gretsch’s iconic sound and style. Featuring a laminated maple body, dual “Black Top” Filter’Tron pickups, and a Bigsby vibrato tailpiece, this guitar delivers rich, resonant tone with classic Gretsch twang and shimmer. With its elegant design, smooth playability, and versatile sound, the G5420T is perfect for players seeking vintage-inspired tone and aesthetics.

  • Construction: Hollowbody with single cut
  • Body: Maple laminated with trestle block
  • Body depth: 70 mm (2.75″)
  • Maple neck
  • Laurel fretboard
  • Pearloid Neo-Classic thumbnail fretboard inlays
  • Neck profile: Classic “C”
  • Nut width: 42.86 mm (1.6875″)
  • Graph Tech NuBone nut
  • 22 Medium jumbo frets
  • Pickup: 2x FT-5E FilterTron humbuckers
  • Volume control for neck pickup
  • Volume control for bridge pickup
  • Master volume control with treble bleed
  • Master tone control
  • Silver plexiglass pickguard with black Gretsch and Electromatic logos
  • Adjusto-Matic bridge with secured Laurel base
  • Bigsby B60
  • Open vintage style tuners
  • Nickel hardware
  • String gauge ex-works: .011 – .049
  • Colour: Orange Stain

item.title: Fender Telecaster Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Iconic solid-body electric guitar known for its timeless design and versatile tone.
item.content:encoded:
The Fender Telecaster is a legendary instrument celebrated for its simplicity, durability, and unmistakable sound. With its solid ash or alder body, bolt-on maple neck, and single-coil pickups, the Telecaster delivers a distinctive twangy tone that’s been heard on countless recordings across various genres. Whether you’re playing country, rock, blues, or beyond, the Telecaster offers timeless style and unmatched playability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Fretboard: Maple
  • Matte neck finish
  • 22 Frets
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V single coils
  • Volume knob and tone knob
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • Standard sealed machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender .009 – .042
  • Colour: Tidepool

item.title: Ibanez SR500 Bass Guitar
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Sleek design. Powerful sound. The Ibanez SR500 bass guitar combines striking looks with versatile tone, making it a favorite among bassists in all genres.
item.content:encoded:
Experience the ultimate blend of style, performance, and versatility with the Ibanez SR500 Bass Guitar. Designed for discerning bassists, this premium instrument offers a sleek, modern design and a wide range of tonal options. The SR500 features a mahogany body with a figured maple top, providing a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain and punch. The slim, fast-playing neck with a 24-fret rosewood fingerboard allows for effortless playability and access to the upper register. Equipped with Bartolini MK-1 pickups and an active EQ circuit, the SR500 delivers a powerful, articulate sound with plenty of clarity and definition. Whether you’re laying down grooves in the studio or holding down the low end on stage, the Ibanez SR500 Bass Guitar is sure to impress.

  • Body: Okoume
  • 5-Piece bolted neck: Jatoba / Walnut
  • Fingerboard: Rosewood
  • Abalone oval fingerboard inlays
  • Neck thickness at 1st fret: 19.5 mm (0.77″) / 12th fret: 21.5 mm (0.85″)
  • Scale: 864 mm (34.02″)
  • Fretboard radius: 305 mm (12.01″)
  • Nut width: 38 mm (1.50″)
  • Plastic nut
  • 24 Medium frets
  • Pickups: 2 Bartolini BH2 humbuckers
  • Controls: volume, balance, bass, mid, treble
  • Ibanez Custom electronics with active 3-band EQ
  • EQ bypass switch
  • Passive tone control on treble knob
  • 3-Way centre frequency switch
  • Accu-cast B505 bridge
  • Ibanez tuners
  • Black hardware
  • Colour: Black Aurora Burst
  • Incl. Allen key
  • Made in Indonesia

Dimensions:

  • Total length: 1121 mm (44.13″)
  • Body length: 512 mm (20.16″)
  • Body width: 323 mm (12.72″)
  • Body thickness: 41 mm (1.61″)

item.title: Martin D-28 Acoustic Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Legendary tone. Unmatched craftsmanship. The Martin D-28 acoustic guitar is a timeless classic, beloved by musicians for its rich, resonant sound and exquisite detail.
item.content:encoded:
Dive into a world of rich, resonant tone with the Martin D-28 Acoustic Guitar. Renowned for its legendary sound and impeccable craftsmanship, the D-28 is a true classic that has been cherished by musicians for generations. Featuring a solid Sitka spruce top and East Indian rosewood back and sides, this instrument delivers a balanced sound with deep bass, clear treble, and a lush, complex midrange. The low profile neck with a modified low oval shape provides exceptional playability, allowing for smooth chord changes and effortless soloing. With its timeless design, premium materials, and exquisite attention to detail, the Martin D-28 is a work of art that inspires musicians to reach new heights of expression and creativity.

  • Style: Dreadnought D-14 Fret
  • Top: Spruce
  • Back and sides: Rosewood
  • Forward-Shifted X-Brace
  • Neck: selected hardwood
  • Fingerboard: Ebony
  • Style 28 Mother-of-Pearl fingerboard inlays
  • Antique white binding
  • Multi-stripe rosette
  • Scale: 645 mm (25.4″)
  • Fretboard radius: 16″
  • Nut width: 44.5 mm (1.75″)
  • Compensated bone nut
  • 20 Frets
  • Tortoise pickguard
  • Ebony bridge with bone saddle
  • Enclosed chrome tuners
  • Factory strings: Martin Guitars MA550T Authentic Treated .013 – .056 (art. 473904)
  • Colour: Aging Toner
  • Incl. hard case
  • Made in USA

item.title: Fender Jazz Bass Guitar
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Smooth style. Dynamic tone. The Fender Jazz Bass is a classic instrument beloved by bassists for its sleek design and versatile sound, perfect for any musical genre.
item.content:encoded:
Embrace the legacy of the Fender Jazz Bass Guitar. As one of the most iconic instruments in the history of music, the Jazz Bass has been a staple in the arsenal of bassists across genres for over 60 years. Renowned for its smooth playability, versatile tone, and timeless design, the Jazz Bass continues to inspire musicians to this day. The Fender Jazz Bass features a sleek offset body shape, slim, fast-playing neck, and dual single-coil pickups, delivering a wide range of tones from deep, rumbling lows to bright, snappy highs. Whether you’re laying down grooves in the studio or holding down the low end on stage, the Fender Jazz Bass is the perfect choice for players who demand style, performance, and reliability.

  • Body: Alder
  • Maple neck
  • Pau Ferro fretboard
  • Matte neck finish
  • 20 Frets
  • Nut width: 38.1 mm
  • Scale: 864 mm (long scale)
  • Pickups: 2 New Player AlNiCo V jazz single coils
  • 2 Volume knobs and 1 tone knob
  • Standard open gear machine heads
  • Ex-factory stringing: Fender 7250M .045 – .105 (article nr 142933)
  • Colour: 3-Tone sunburst

item.title: Epiphone Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Classic design. Affordable quality. The Epiphone Les Paul Standard offers the iconic look and sound of the original at a fraction of the price, making it accessible to musicians of all levels.
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to rock with the Epiphone Les Paul Standard Electric Guitar. Inspired by the iconic Gibson original, this affordable instrument delivers classic Les Paul tone and style at a fraction of the price. The mahogany body and maple top provide a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain, while the SlimTaper “D” profile neck offers smooth playability and effortless access to all 22 frets. Equipped with a pair of Alnico Classic humbucking pickups, the Les Paul Standard delivers rich, full-bodied tones with plenty of bite and sustain, making it perfect for everything from blues and rock to metal and beyond. With its timeless design, legendary sound, and unbeatable value, the Epiphone Les Paul Standard is the perfect choice for players of all styles and skill levels.

  • Limited edition
  • Top: flamed maple
  • Body: Mahogany
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fingerboard: Indian laurel
  • Long neck tenon
  • New Kalamazoo headstock
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • Nut width: 42 mm
  • Neck profile: 50s Vintage
  • 22 Frets
  • Pickup: 2 Gibson Burstbucker humbucker
  • 2 x Volume and 2 x tone controls
  • 3-Way toggle switch
  • ’50s wiring with CTS potentiometers and Mallory capacitors
  • Epiphone LockTone ABR-1 bridge with stopbar tailpiece
  • Kluson-style machine heads
  • Colour: Aged Dark Burst
  • Incl. vintage-style case

item.title: Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Sleek style. Aggressive tone. The Gibson SG Standard is a rock icon known for its devilish looks and powerful sound, favored by players seeking raw energy and playability.
item.content:encoded:
Prepare to rock out in style with the Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar. Boasting a sleek, double-cutaway design and iconic sound, the SG Standard is a favorite among guitarists seeking a powerful, no-nonsense instrument. The mahogany body and neck provide a warm, resonant tone with plenty of sustain, while the slim-tapered neck profile offers fast, comfortable playability. Equipped with a pair of high-output humbucking pickups, the SG Standard delivers thick, crunchy tones with plenty of bite and aggression, making it perfect for everything from classic rock to heavy metal. With its timeless design, legendary tone, and uncompromising quality, the Gibson SG Standard is sure to inspire you to new heights of musical creativity.

  • Body: Mahogany
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fretboard: Rosewood (Dalbergia latifolia)
  • Neck profile: Slim Taper
  • Graphtech nut
  • Nut width: 43 mm
  • Scale: 628 mm
  • 22 Cold-treated medium frets
  • Trapeze fretboard inlays
  • Cream fretboard binding
  • ABR-1 Tuneomatic bridge
  • Pickups: Burstbucker 61R (neck) and 61T (bridge) humbuckers
  • 2 Volume and 2 tone controls
  • Vintage deluxe machine heads
  • Colour: Heritage Cherry
  • Includes case
  • Made in USA

item.title: Fender Precision Bass Guitar
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Groundbreaking design. Deep, punchy tone. The Fender Precision Bass revolutionized music with its solid build and powerful sound, becoming a staple in every bassist's arsenal.
item.content:encoded:
Experience the foundation of modern music with the Fender Precision Bass Guitar. As the world’s first commercially successful electric bass, the Precision Bass has played a pivotal role in shaping the sound of popular music since its introduction in 1951. This iconic instrument features a comfortable maple neck with a modern “C” shape profile, providing smooth playability and effortless access to all 20 frets. The split single-coil pickup delivers a punchy, defined tone with plenty of low-end thump, making it the go-to choice for bassists in virtually every genre. With its sleek design, legendary tone, and unmatched playability, the Fender Precision Bass continues to inspire musicians worldwide.

  • Fender Precision Bass Sunburst model
  • Officially licensed
  • Scale 1:4
  • Handmade with solid wood and metal tuning screws
  • Size: approx. 11.4 x 30 cm
  • Incl. adjustable miniature guitar stand and guitar case gift box

item.title: Taylor 214ce Grand Auditorium Acoustic Guitar
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Superior craftsmanship. Exceptional tone. The Taylor 214ce acoustic guitar blends elegance with performance, delivering rich sound and comfortable playability.
item.content:encoded:
Experience the perfect blend of comfort, playability, and tone with the Taylor 214ce Grand Auditorium Acoustic Guitar. Featuring a solid Sitka spruce top and layered rosewood back and sides, this versatile instrument delivers a balanced sound with crisp highs, rich mids, and deep lows. The Grand Auditorium body shape provides excellent projection and articulation, making it ideal for both strumming and fingerstyle playing. Equipped with Taylor’s Expression System 2 pickup, the 214ce delivers natural-sounding amplified tone, whether you’re performing on stage or recording in the studio. With its sleek Venetian cutaway, satin-finished neck, and elegant appointments such as white binding and mother-of-pearl dot inlays, the Taylor 214ce is as beautiful to look at as it is to play.

  • Style: Grand Auditorium with cutaway
  • Top: solid sitka spruce
  • Back and sides: Rosewood plywood
  • Neck: Mahogany
  • Fingerboard: Ebony
  • Scale: 648 mm
  • Nut width: 42.8 mm
  • Nut: Nubone
  • 20 Frets
  • Pickup: ES2 Expression System
  • Faux Tortoiseshell pickguard
  • Ebony bridge with TUSQ saddle
  • Colour: Natural
  • Includes gig bag
